import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Foods } from '../shared/model/food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent implements { public selectedFoods: Foods[] = []; }
